title: Teenager shot near Long Beach Poly High School
content:
A teenager was hospitalized after being shot near Poly High School in Long Beach Friday afternoon, according to police.
Officers responded around 4 p.m. to the intersection of Martin Luther King Avenue and 15th Street after getting a call about a possible shooting in the area, Long Beach police spokeswoman Marlene Arrona said.
There, they found a 17-year-old male victim with a gunshot wound, Arrona said.
Paramedics took the teenager to the hospital where he was listed in stable condition, police said.
Police did not release any further information. Detectives are investigating the case as possibly gang related, Arrona said.
